Got this for my kids for a road trip. Paired well with our nexus tablet. Battery lasted long enough that it never ran out on us. Though I did make sure I kept it charged just in case. Total of about 50 road hours of use. Will use it on our next trip. Was loud enough, even when driving highway speeds. Great for a nice, small device. Much better than some other 3.5 mm speakers I purchased elsewhere.

Excellent speaker for the price...I have purchased 2 and enjoy them. I put one in my toiletries bag for my travel to have my morning music playing and the other is just a transient speaker I can grab and go. Great clarity and volume....very impressive. Since they are new, I have no information on long-term durability with the battery, etc., but at less than $20 it doesn't matter much. Highly recommend..I will be buying more.

Now, I am basing my review on the size/price of the speaker. I am not saying this thing competes with the Amazon echo or the a Bose Bluetooth speaker. I think it has good sound for such a tiny speaker so it's perfect for me - I can easily tuck it away on my desk and listen to my music, sports & news. If you are looking for something with a lot of bass, this isn't the speaker for you but for casual listening, it's great.

reviews.review_header: I thought it would be great for my walks
reviews.review_text: This speaker has an incredible sound for such a small speaker. I thought it would be great for my walks, but it is a bit bulky with shorts and a t-shirt. If I go walking in cooler weather and have a hoodie onI can put it in the hood or the front pocket. It is easy to pair with a device, and it comes with a charge cable andn audio cable for non-BT devices and a nice pouch. I paired it with a Jabra Bluetooth dongle, and it should easily pair with any phone or tablet. Well worth the money, and it has a long warranty.
Purchased for my teenage granddaughter to use with her cell phone

reviews.review_header: Great little speaker, better customer service
reviews.review_text: I originally posted that this speaker was crap and you should buy the bigger one. I was immediately contacted by Anker customer service who said it was likely a factory defect and they sent another in the mail right away. I got it a few days later and it works perfectly. For the size it really packs a punch. Thank you Anker for this great product and excellent customer service!

I absolutely LOVE this speaker. I bought this for work as a "whatever" item since it is just for my office. I really underestimated the sound quality. Anker did an amazing job with this tiny device the base is fantastic and the clarity of the sound is wonderful. even at very low volumes the sound quality is clear and shines through. I am a fan and now a customer! I just ordered the SoundCore for my apartment. Can't wait until it arrives!

reviews.review_header: A giant of a speaker! Don't let the size fool you!
reviews.review_text: This is a giant in a small package! I have other Bluetooth speakers that cost far more then the Anker pocket speaker, no matter how I would try, most times with the more expensive speaker the words were out of sync! NOT with the Anker!! It's been PERFECTLY synced each time that I have used the speaker,which is daily. Not to mention the very long battery life before needing a charge. I'm so glad I purchased this Anker speaker, I was sceptical by the size at first. But in the end it it are GREAT PURCHASE!! Thanks Anker for a GREAT product!

reviews.review_header: Good sound for such a tiny speaker
reviews.review_text: Good sound for such a tiny speaker. Battery also lasts long. Would have given it five stars if not for the connectivity issue with my laptop. The speaker wouldn't connect my laptop via bluetooth even if drivers have been installed, which was the reason why I bought the speaker in the first place. It works with the wire connection. No problems with bluetooth connection for my phones and tablet.

reviews.review_header: I bought this "little thing" for my GF. She ...
reviews.review_text: I bought this "little thing" for my GF. She absolutely loves it! Simple to use. Simple to charge. She uses it to listen to talk podcasts wherever she needs something a bit louder than her phone -- washing the dishes, bathroom etc. I got lots of cudos (if you know what I mean) from giving it to her as a gift. It has limitations. Don't expect "booming bass" from something so small. No ear splitting sound. No funky sound controls. On. Off. Volume? Your phone. If my description fits your requirements, you can't go wrong. It's so cheap!

I am happy with this product. I have had it for a few weeks now and this is the first time that I have had to charge it. To be sure that I was charging it correctly, I wanted to look at the manual. Since I was at work, I didn't have the manual but I was pleased to see that it was a few clicks away on their website, available as a pdf. This product feels like a quality item and it sounds great for its compact size.

Anker has delivered a great little speaker, ideal for expanding the reach of sound available to my tablet. I was expecting a more "tinny" sound from the speaker but it has delivered a nice well rounded sound to my streaming movies. Obviously, its not going to have world shaking bass but you wouldn't expect that from a speaker like this either. I mainly use the Anker when cooking and watching Netflix and it allows me to keep up with the movie or TV show while moving between the different spots in the kitchen (stove, fridge, counter, repeat...).

reviews.review_header: I think it works better with videos than music
reviews.review_text: I'm very impressed with this little speaker! It obviously doesn't have a ton of bass or anything, but it works perfectly for connecting to my iPad and streaming videos. I think it works better with videos than music. If you're getting a speaker mainly for music listening, you might want to invest in something a little better if you're an audiophile even in the slightest. It sounds perfect while watching YouTube, Netflix movies or tv shows on kodi. It really is tiny and easy to carry around too.

reviews.review_header: Excellent for listening to a book
reviews.review_text: Excellent for listening to a book, however if listening to a composition that is of classical nature, this seems to dull the higher pitches. They come off flat. Example, Eponine's soliloquy of "On my own" from the London Cast which naturally sounds quite sweet, sounded as if she was inside a card board box. However! That is not why I got the pocket box, it was to listen to books, and so long as the reader is not a deep base, this amplifies the song quite nicely.

reviews.review_header: Great overall speaker for the money
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a replacement for my Jam Speaker that I have and love. Only downfall with the Jam is battery life is only good for about 2-3 hours and it dies. This little guy really does last about 12 hours. Honestly I've never had it die on me. I've used for 2 times in a row, probably averaging about 4 hours each time, and they I might just throw on charger. Has great sound. Only thing I wish it had was volume control directly on the device, instead you control by your phone. Not a big deal. Can't beat it for $20

reviews.review_header: Not Great But Decent Sound Given It's Tiny Size And Nice Build Quality.
reviews.review_text: I wasn't as impressed as others with the sound this little guy produces. There's virtually no bass and highs aren't one of it's virtues either. That being said, I wasn't expecting much from such a tiny little thing but the sound is decent for it's size. I'm giving it 4 stars because of it's build quality, (all of Anker's products seem to possess the same great build quality), and it's sound is decent enough given it's small size.

I LOVE this little speaker. I haven't even had to charge it yet (great battery life). I use it in the car for my phone's car mode (my car is old and doesn't have a phone audio jack) and if I'm playing music in my apartment I can just bring the speaker with me and leave my phone wherever because the range covers my whole apartment! I love the little bag holder it comes with too. It's got great sound for a little thing. I'm not into a ton of bass normally, but it's got a good, well rounded sound and can handle any of my music without garbled sounds or anything! Plus it's super tiny and fits everywhere.

reviews.review_header: Initially it was great: amazing sound and a great battery life not ...
reviews.review_text: I bought this speaker less than a year ago. Initially it was great: amazing sound and a great battery life not to mention its size was perfect to travel with. But now after several hours or charging and despite the red light appears, the speaker its dead. This was my first Anker product and its why i bought a couple of batteries and recommend it to a couple of friends; but i must say, im dissappointed with his life use: less than a year.I expect non of my other anker products turns out to be this bad.

reviews.review_header: This speaker is a must buy for portable lovers
reviews.review_text: This speaker is a miracle. For this size and price? I showed this to so many friends and they were amazed that such a small speaker had such amazing sound quality and amazing bass. It's loud. For this size speaker it's pretty loud. The battery life is just as it says. 12 hrs. No problems with the aux cord or the bluetooth capability, they both work flawless. This speaker is a real steal!

reviews.review_header: Great sound and price, tiny speaker.
reviews.review_text: This speaker has great sound for the size, and really good quality for the price. My teen son who ordered it takes it with him to hang out with friends, and does things like stashing it in his hood just to surprise people. I've actually been meaning to buy another one for myself. Great product, great price. The only thing that is not fabulous about it is that if you put it on a smooth surface, it reaches a point with some volumes/bass where it starts to scoot across the surface, but it seems like that might happen with any speaker at some level.

reviews.review_header: small device .. high sound .. with constant hiss / Great Costomer Support
reviews.review_text: Really small device with a high sound level the only problem that there is a constant hiss sound with low volume .. recognized easily in a quiet environment pairs easily. but the hiss is disappointing ------------------------------- Update 21/7/2015 --------------------------------------- Contacted support they issued a full refund. Anker Customer Support is the best, I will still buy and recommend Anker products. 5 Stars for the Customer support , no need to worry about you money in-case you have a defective product.

reviews.review_header: Amazing tiny speaker. How wrong can you go for the price?
reviews.review_text: Amazing speaker for the price. I've gone through a number of small portable speakers over the years, and decided I was going to have to buy a Bose to get what I wanted, or stick with plugging in PC speakers to the wall and my phone (a good solution, just not super portable or small). Well, instead I got this little guy, and sure the bass isn't amazing, but the sound quality is great, the battery is fantastic, and it's TINY. I've been recommending this to friends since I got mine.

Awesome!! Love it, sounds perfect, the weight gives me confidence and the connection is pretty good, the pocket that came with it is great, and it has an aux cable as well, in case something happens with bluetooth I have it. LOVE Anker!! I'll buy anything from them, I have bought 3 lightning cables for me and my girlfriend's iPhones and now this, better than expected, looking forward to get the bigger one soon! :D

What a great purchase! This is a little tiny cube that communicates with your mp3 player via bluetooth technology. The sound is surprisingly robust for such a small piece of technology and I really like the little velveteen bag it comes with (it's large enough to fit the speaker and its charging cords). The only thing wrong is that it is so small, I sometimes misplace it! :-) This is the third or fourth Anker product I've purchased, and I'm pleased with their consistent quality. Love it!
Poor sound.

reviews.review_header: This is a fun little speaker
reviews.review_text: This is a fun little speaker! Yes, it's not going to win any awards for sound quality, but the sound out of this speaker is much bigger than the device. In my room, I can turn this well past comfortable listening volume, without any kind of distortion from the speaker. It has a decent bit of bass punch to boot. The design feels really nice and high quality. I had a consistent Bluetooth connection up to about 30' from my iPhone 6 Plus. It really surprises people when I drop this little cube next to them playing music. I'm ordering a bunch more of these as gifts.

reviews.review_header: very cute! .. Sounds great for its size.. I think im gonna make it a keychain..
reviews.review_text: I bought this because of its size.. Its ridiculously small!! Its perfect for small groups.. If you would want everyone to hear what ur playing, compared to the built in speakers of your phone, this is the way to go.. For its size, the bass is good.. But dont expect for a room filling bass.. Good thing is that it produces the bass you need to hear considering its size.. It just has one button.. The power button.. And only one connection port.. A micro USB port.. For charging and AUX connection.. Yes.. AUX.. Included is a 3.5mm audio jack to micro usb cable.. Not a quite common cable.. So dont lose this.. Overall, this is one quite peculiar thing to have.. Apart from your larger bluetooth speakers.. This is a lot easier to bring along.. I would probably make this a keychain. ;)

I don't think I can say anything that hasn't already been said. This little speaker is amazing! I use it at work. I can keep it low for my personal pleasure or crank it when the office girls wanna dance to some Uptown Funk! If you don't have headphones for your phone, you can also duct tape this speaker to your ear. You'll look like a dork, but when AC/DC is blasting in your eardrums who cares? For the money you can't beat this little speaker.

reviews.review_header: Good price, size, sound, and buy.
reviews.review_text: Battery life is great for its size, and sound is incredible. It pairs easily, packs easily, and sounds better than you would expect. The only thing I would change would be to add volume buttons. The larger model (larger battery and speaker) has volume buttons. I can't imagine adding that feature would add too much to the size, but I could be wrong. If you want a speaker and are fine using your device for volume and track control, it's hard to go wrong with this for the price

I love this little tiny cube speaker. I can use it with my mp3 player or hook it up to the phone or iPad via bluetooth and it works great. I was afraid not having a volume control would be a problem, but its sound is so much better and louder than other small speakers, it is easily controlled using the volume on the mp3 or phone. I am listening to audiobooks almost always. Works great for that.

I bought one of these speakers and I used it for a month and it began to give off a high pitch ringing when sound came out. Left a bad review on Amazon and AnkerDirect contacted me via email explaining they would love to replace the bad one for a new one. I got the new one and it works excellent. Must of bought a bad speaker but either way the Anker company really cares about their customers. Good quality speaker too!

This was an Amazen little Bluetooth Speaker, and for it's size it makes wonders. Unfortunately I ended up selling it to a friend. Nothing is wrong with it at alk but just wasn't what I was really looking for. I needed something with more sound/mic so this wasn't the speaker for me per say as having a bit larger and louder speaker would be no issue. So I'll maybe order the another BT speaker by Anker that has the sound level I'm searching for.

Ordered this for my Mom. She said it's ok because sometimes the speaker doesn't turn on with just one press of the button. When I had first turned it on and paired it with Bluetooth it worked great and the sound was clear and loud for such a small speaker (but I'm not the main user). She says it has glitches here and there, mainly with trying to figure out if the speaker is on or not because the on light/button is not always lit. Overall, this little speaker does it's job for a very fair price.

Before buying this speaker. I read some reviews about it and the reviews we're right. However, there are things that let's say that i don't like about it. First, The speaker is doesn't produce good bass. I have other bluetooth speaker which is 1 inch bigger than this but it produces good bass. Second, The sound of the speaker has this scratchy sound when I play high quality songs. Third, you need to longpress or press the button twice to turn on. This is a good buy for it's price!

reviews.review_header: Works like itʻs supposed to - Miraculous!
reviews.review_text: An excellent device, especially because itʻs so easy to use and simple to control. Itʻs wonderful that I donʻt need any Advanced Degrees to get the thing going. Thereʻs one pushbutton with a little light in the middle, "On" and "Off" and "Bluetooth Connect". And then it works! excellent sound quality, especially for such a small device, and brings the sound output of my iPad up to where I can hear it across the room instead of having to lean my ear against it.

Wow! This thing is truly awesome. Got it for the wife for Christmas and i am going to be buying a few more. They are really loud with Great sound and Good Bass. I could not believe the quality for the price . I was truly taken back . Smaller than a ring box id say . They Really crank and the portability is so awesome. Way easier than any Bluetooth Headsets or speakers Ive ever used too . Instantly registers on every device i have tried so far .

Saw a few of the bad reviews, DON'T HESITATE! JUST BUY IT! Received mine today and had it up and running in less than 5 minutes. I expected an ok product but was FLOORED when I turned it on! You will not believe the sound that comes out of this little thing! If the other Anker products are as good as this, I'M SOLD! Looking at one of their external battery packs now; will definitely be doing more business with this vendor!

Super small and reliable. This is not an expensive system, but offers great sound for the size. Perfect for travelling - listening to music from the phone, or watching movies from the laptop. Much better sound than my phone (Sony Xperia) and laptop (Macbook Pro).

I'm very impressed with this little speaker. The speaker is very small but it gets very loud and stays clear even at max volume with almost no distortion. Great for travel amazing battery life! I saw a few reviews that said it makes a static buzzing noise that is a problem with older apple products I have noticed everytime I used to connect my old iPhone 4s almost every Bluetooth or auxiliary system always had static. So if you have the static try using a differnt device to connect it to because it's not the speaker it's the phone

Awesome! Battery life is long. Size is very compact. I got 10 of them for all my nephews and nieces this Christmas. I even kept one for myself. Great and loud sound. Bass is ok, but then again, something this small is not going to vibrate the windows. Sound quality was crisp and clear. This has no volume or track forward, pause, reverse buttons at all. Just on or off. Everything else has to be controlled on your media player.

Everyone always comments on the great sound that comes from this tiny box! I use it for massage going to clients' homes, and it's PERFECT. They love it! Great sound! You can't beat it for the price. I have spent $50 and more for really cheap "portable" speakers that die after a year of use. This is small, portable, and great quality.

reviews.review_header: Blows JBL, Jambox, and other $99 or less blutooth speakers out of the water
reviews.review_text: ... And yet, it's literally 1/4 of the size and more than 60% less costly than other comperable-performing speakers on the market. Also, it comes with a micro USB to audio jack cable, so you can plug it right into your non-Bluetooth enabled device. Best buy you'll make all week. I want one for every room. Anker makes a great quality product. I'm curious... If the "mini box" can be heard clearly and without distortion from across the house, what can the classic (larger) Anker unit do? I think I may just have to buy it to find out and compare! :)

This speaker has impressive sound for something so small and portable. I bought it for a friend to use at work and could resist testing it out and charging it before giving it to her. I use a JBL Charge 2 at work which is awesome but bulky. She wanted something smaller without sacrificing too much sound quality and battery life. The Charge 2 has a longer battery life and better bass but for 5x the price, this is the better deal. If you buy this, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_header: My coworkers were making fun of me saying that you need a big one ...
reviews.review_text: I got this pocket size speaker today and was excited to test it out. My coworkers were making fun of me saying that you need a big one for a good sound. But I turned this baby on and proved them wrong. They were amazed how loud it was! So I went on in my day listening to music for 10 hours, my whole shift! I did not charge it! I do not regret it. I love it.

reviews.review_header: and it sounds better than the first boom box I ever had
reviews.review_text: This speaker is smaller than my cat was when it was born, and it sounds better than the first boom box I ever had! I recommend this to anyone. For the size, and price, it is one of the best portable speakers out there.

No $20 bluetooth speaker should be this nice. To not think that this is, by far, the best twenty buck you have spent in a while is ludicrous. It is well built / designed, very good battery life, much louder than you would think from a speaker this size, clear sound at higher volumes and pleasant enough tonal quality. If you're expecting Bose Soundlink III quality then you you will be somewhat disappointed. That being said, you did save $280. This speaker exceeds all realistic expectations. Another win for Anker.

Pretty Awesome for its size, doesn't have massive bass but come on what do you expect? this little thing does however, get pretty loud, use power amp app on your phone and you get pretty good sound! haven't tested the battery life to see if advertised is accurate but I am happy to carry this along when I go out for the day and know I have a nice option to play music at a louder and better sound than my phone, without draining the battery life of my phone so quickly,

reviews.review_header: Perfect speaker for my office imac
reviews.review_text: At work i have a mac mini that i wanted some external speakers for but i didn't need anything large since i mostly use headphones. It's just sometimes you need to look at something with people and have external speakers for and this fits the bill. The bluetooth setup was easy, and i just flip on the bluetooth when i need the speakers and turn it on, and no prob.. ez speakers. Sound is great for something this size and when i'm not using it it fits nicely into my underdesk drawer.

Powerful, amazing, I have the Bose mini Speaker that costs $299.00. Very good sound, but for this price, this unit is hard to beat. Everything about this speaker is perfect. Small light perfect. Thank you Anker for another fantastic product.

I wasn't in the market for a Bluetooth speaker, but I stumbled upon this thing and figured I'd check it out. I'm INCREDIBLY impressed. Of course, the bass is limited/nonexistent, but for $20 it's really an awesome product. The sound quality is solid, volume is good, it weighs nothing, and it's stylish to boot! Works fine in my car, in the shower (away from the water of course!), walking down the street, in the office -- wherever. You can't lose with this thing.

reviews.review_header: Another perfect Anker product! Buy it!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this little speaker. Loud, tiny and sleek. I use it for listening to audiobooks and podcasts, so I can't assess it for music. But I'm getting rid of my other, larger, Bluetooth speakers. A wonderful product for a wonderful price. As an aside, I have several Anker products and they are all well made, well designed, and work perfectly.

reviews.review_header: Sounds a little tin can like. So four stars
reviews.review_text: Sounds a little tin can like. So four stars. For it's size though WOW! It fills up the donut shop I work at with a waaaay better sound than the old CD they have in there, and works great with my Pandora account via phone bluetooth. A little awkward to hear my text tone go off sometimes though. I wish those could be enabled through it but those and my only gripes. I would rebuy it for sure.

Happy with this little speaker. It gets really loud, it's clear, great sound for such a small speaker. Totally worth the price. Also looks great. It's well-built and can be thrown into the small pocket of a bag. At first sight a friend thought it was a ring box. The only downside, and this is the same for a lot of devices, is that you can't have it connected to more than one device. You have to disconnect if from one before it can play on another.
Excellent battery life, very good sound quality, impressive volume, easy to use. Small and portable.

reviews.review_header: Great bang for the buck and more!
reviews.review_text: Just purchased the Anker Portable Pocket, been playing it all day and am very pleased. Incredible sound, more than enough volume to fill a 20x20' room and more than adequate bass response. Co-workers all were impressed; highly recommend this product!

This little speaker has great sound. No problems with connecting. It doesn't sound like a home stereo but it's way better than the speakers on my tablet. I can put it in the dining room and still hear it good a couple rooms away. Haven't tried to run the battery down to test how long it will last but I've been using it on and off for a week without recharging it. For it's size I'm impressed!

The speaker is good and very portable. My only problem with it is that it makes a static noise when the volume is low. When its high its almost not noticeable, but I rarely need it loud so I keep it low. The noise has almost made this speaker non-usable because it irritates my ears. I don't know if this is just my model or if anybody also notices the static noise.

Powerful little brother to the Anker Classic (the big brother is good for about 20 hrs play/charge vs.12 hrs for this one). Not a party device, but excellent for your workplace or bedroom. For $20 it includes bluetooth capability and aux cord and charge cord as well as nice bag. Small enough to carry easily. Engineers at Anker have done it again. I have been very pleased with the 3 Anker items I now own. Hard to beat this one at this price.
The product is good and beautiful, thank Amazon international direct shipping service

Awesome speaker! The size of my two months old feet but packs a powerful sound. I got this to play white noise for baby while still using my iPhone. Perfect combo! I also have a bose machine and much rather use this.

reviews.review_header: Great buy. Perfect gift. You will always be the life of the party.
reviews.review_text: The best little speaker ever. Last a long time. Gives you the freedom to move around without carrying my Ipad which plays my music. The distance isn't that far but for the price and the size this is a great buy. The sound is great to me. It goes the distance. Family has two already.

I bought this item for my aunt as a gift, she absolutely loved it. The extra accessories it come with for the phone made it so easy to connect. Its extremely loud for a small speaker and what i loved most you can bring it anywhere, the beach, in the car, out with friends, i mean anywhere. The next good thing is that if you have it on your phone and your phone rings, you can actually talk through the speaker. I think its a fun speaker and i am glad i bought it. i HOPE I HELP SOMEONE TODAY

What?!?! For the size & price of this thing...incredible. Sure, it doesn't have rumbling bass or enough volume to support a big party, but it's the size of a damn walnut. Every friend & family member who has seen/heard it has been floored by this amazing & fun little piece of technology. Great job Anker!

When it comes to sound quality, cannot be compared to larger speakers. But for the price and the small size, sound reproduction is outstanding. I wanted smallest size possible and they delivered excellent sound considering its tiny size. Notes: Very easy to pair via Bluetooth. No volume controls. But no problem. Can control volume from device.

reviews.review_header: Better Sound Accessory for Smart Phones and Tablets
reviews.review_text: Speakers have come a long way since they first appeared in tablets and phones. The speaker in the Galaxy Note 4 is more than acceptable. I wasn't sure it would be worth trying to step it up. But I'm glad I did. The sound that comes from this little cube is astounding. It turns the smart phone into a real audio center. I often turn to it rather than my Mp3. Small size makes it easy to always have it with you. And what a bargain. It's price makes it irresistible.

reviews.review_header: Doesn't work great with Linux Mint
reviews.review_text: Doesn't work great with Linux Mint. I was able to get it working but had to reinitialize it each time I wanted to reconnect it... Then after a while that stopped working and now every time I try to connect it fails but not until after it disconnects all of my other bluetooth devices, useless now.

reviews.review_header: at 75% or lower it sounds pretty good. Overall it's a solid purchase for the ...
reviews.review_text: Umm...it's ok. I mean it's a cheap speaker with cheap sound. Battery life is outstanding --I charge it once a week and use it a couple of hours 3 or 4 days a week. I would not use it at full volume because it becomes noisy, at 75% or lower it sounds pretty good. Overall it's a solid purchase for the price...but if you want quality I would not recommend this little guy.

Don't let the size of this speaker fool you. It's quite compact but packs a powerful sound. It comes with a carrying pouch and all the necessary cords for recharging and hooking it up to your device should you not be able to do so thru Bluetooth. I'm always pleased with Anker products and anticipate getting a good deal of use out of this speaker.

Love this speaker. Clear sound, easy connectivity with a multitude of devices Apple, Android, and Windows Bluetooth enabled devices. The battery life lasts very well and it charges fast! The speaker comes with charging cables a bag for storage and is very well constructed. The packaging is amazing as all Anker products are. I love this company for their amazing devices!

reviews.review_header: Loud and clear, but note the cable!
reviews.review_text: Loud and clear in an unbelievable small unit. The quality stunned my family! Bluetooth reaches about 10-15 meters with my iPhone. Note: I thought the cable out would be audio jack to audio jack, but the "audio in" is a USB micro jack on the unit (same port as for charging). This means it needs a special cable to plug into most radios or non-bluetooth music players. The correct cable is included but it would probably be a pain to find another.

reviews.review_header: Iw ish ithad better sound quality, but great volume for the size
reviews.review_text: I was impressed by how laud this little box is but not impressed with the quality of sound. Perhaps, it is indeed perfect for traveling, but if you want to listen to webinars or books on your computer, it must be something bigger. I have sharp image speaker that is 5 times bigger, so it takes more space in my backpack, but the sound quality is much better.

reviews.review_header: It sounded awesome. Better than my much much more expensive radio ...
reviews.review_text: I am techno- challenged, as far as connecting things properly. I cracked open the box to this yesterday, and in 5 minutes it was playing music from both my computer and iPad. It sounded awesome. Better than my much much more expensive radio with a much talked about speaker system-- well, at least to me. It picked up subtle sounds that were missing from listening with my old mini speakers. And indeed-- its tiny, simple to use, and all things in life should be this easy to use, and this fine.

I bought this for travel, so that I will have it in hotel rooms. It is great for that. The sound is very good. I think for your home you will want something with a larger speaker, but for $25 or so, this is a nice addition to your bluetooth items. Also it is great in my antique car which has no radio and no cig lighter to plug into. So now I can drive along with great sound, good volume and it goes many hours on a charge. I haven't really tested that yet but they claim 12 hours.

reviews.review_header: Quit working properly almost immediately. Very disappointing
reviews.review_text: I started off loving this speaker. It is tiny but has a huge sound ! The battery life is tremendous and it charges in no time. What makes me now dislike intensely is the fact it stopped working correctly less than 10 days after I received it. It is now very staticky and the sound fades in and out . I feel like I am listening to a radio station that is not quite tuned in. I am very disappointed. 20 dollars is a lot for me to throw away. Usually Anker hits home runs..I have many of their products. This time..I got the dud.

This is one sweet little speaker. Amazing sound quality. It fills my family room without distorting when the volume is turned up. And it really is small. Gives every appearance of being well made. It has one micro B port for charging and for the audio cable. I like that as I can just use my cell phone charger when I travel. You can use it while it charges. It has a simple but audible tone when it turns on and off. It was easy to pair. Trust me, well worth the $20.

This thing is sweet! At first I thought it would be a cheap ol' novelty item. It arrived 2 days ago. I was surprised. It has a hefty quality feel to it. It was easy to pair with my Samsung Edge. It has great sound too. The volume to static ratio is awesome I cranked it and there was virtually no distortion. I am very impressed. I recommend this to anyone. Matter of fact I am going to buy a few for Christmas presents.

reviews.review_header: Ok if you don't get a lemon...
reviews.review_text: I bought two of these. One worked fine. The other must be faulty because it has so much static that it overpowers the music at low volume levels. I connected to both from the same bluetooth phone and app, so the fault is with the speaker itself. It is good if you don't get a lemon like I must have done.

Love this like speaker! Very loud for its size. Obviously not going to sound like a larger, nicer stereo system but compared to just my phone it's awesome. Unfortunately my phone is not compatible with the NFC or Bluetooth (not the speakers fault, just my old beat up phone's) so I use the cable, however I have tried linking it with other updated phones & it works just fine. I use this at my job since I'm in the field all day switching locations & also while sitting on my patio at home. Thanks Anker!

For the price, this is a great little speaker that deserves 5 stars. Have no idea how they do it, but the quality of sound coming from this little thing is fantastic. You would never think you could actually get any bass from this, but you do. This is not hi-fi by any means, but for a small, portable all-in-one speaker that costs in the low $20s, you can't go wrong. It also holds a charge for 8+ hours - I start using it at 8am and it is still going when I turn it off at 5pm quitting time.

The Best quality and most reliable product from Anker. Worth the $20 for sure. Its Just Portable, Cute, Efficient, Smart, and ....... the list goes on. Just fell for it for the first time ;) Clear sound, Loud enough to watch movies in the house and picnics. Durable. Also, Amazon 's Same day delivery is super. Just received it Today (05-29) Feels good. Overall, Incredible product which is so powerful and soo cute.

Just got it and I hate tinny speakers (which the rest of my family doesn't seem to mind hanging off their electronics). I'm rocking right now and these have some seriously dynamic range in a truly small ring box. Pairing was a no-brainer using an iTouch. I was up in under 10 seconds. I'm definitely buying more of these bad boys. Incredible (slightly expensive) stocking stuffer....it's that small. And only 1 jack/cord for both charging or line in (not both at the same time)

Awesome little bluetooth speaker. I was happy to see that the speaker feels nice to the touch as in high quality products and the sound is very nice and crisp. I'll be buying a couple more for my wife and friends. I love it and highly recommend it. 👍

reviews.review_header: This is a great little speaker
reviews.review_text: This is a great little speaker. I bought this for camping trips with my wife. Bluetooth works great as long as you don't go further than 15ft in my experience. It cannot handle too much bass as the speaker is the size of a one inch tile, but the sound coming from the speaker is quite good for the size. I would recommend as long as you don't have the need for a lot bass otherwise this a great product. The battery lasts for a long time as well I would say 8-10 hrs worth of playtime.

reviews.review_header: Best Portable Speaker for the price
reviews.review_text: This was the best bluetooth speaker I got for the money. for just $20 this tiny thing is a beast for me, because compared to other 35 bluetooth speakers I got around the same price range, are nothing compared to this. it sounds amazing, and voice is crystal clear for such a small speaker. it also has good bass. I Highly recommend this to those who are looking for a small portable but High quality bluetooth speaker.

reviews.review_header: This is a great little speaker to take to the beach or use ...
reviews.review_text: This is a great little speaker to take to the beach or use at home. We've done both and have had great results. It's not going to have the sound quality of, say a Bose speaker, but it has great sound quality for what it is. You can obviously hear it better in an indoor setting, but we have used it outdoors just to have some music in the background and it has worked well.

I love this little speaker. The sound is quite good for the size and weight. I use it when I travel and it works well in a hotel room. The battery lasts a really long time as Bluetooth speakers go. I recently took one of these on a trip to Ecuador. Ended up leaving it with my brother in law who lives there. I bought a new one for myself as soon as I got home. Thanks for a great product. Jim

This thing...this thing is THE GREATEST! This incredibly small little speaker puts out so much sound for its size - those who say the sound is not enough must live in a mansion. I have had friends over and had music blasting out of this. I wish it had a function to control forward/backward tracking, though you can push the power button to toggle pause/play. Very happy with this!

reviews.review_header: Good As Your Only Bluetooth Speaker
reviews.review_text: The sound on this speaker is good for the size; I have no complaints about that, and the look is neat and black-artsy stylish. I kept is always plugged in, so I don't know about the battery life. My star off is for the no volume control. I think using the volume control from your phone would be OK if this was the only Bluetooth speaker you have. This is my third Bluetooth output device after the stereo in my car and the SoundBlaster Roar I use around the house and yard. Those two devices have volume controls, so they like it when I crank my phone. I bought the Anker Ultra Portable Pocket Size Wireless Bluetooth Speaker for my office. In my car my phone is at max volume, and when I connect to the Anker, it blasts in my office until I quickly turn down my phone (and I cannot adjust the Bluetooth volume until it connects and starts playing). Then I get back in my car at the end of the day and try to play music, and it's, like, "Where's the music? Oh, yeah, I have to turn it back up." while negotiating traffic pulling out of the parking lot. Also, with the phone as the only volume control, I would need to really concentrate at my desk, and the song would be recorded really strong, and at volume level 1 on my phone, it was still too loud. A device with volume control would let me better feather off the low volume. And, system sounds from your phone can be startlingly loud. I returned the speaker to get one with volume control.
I returned it. Had static.

reviews.review_header: Great sound for such a little device and easy setup
reviews.review_text: We love this darling little bluetooth speaker. Lots of great sound for such a little item. Pairing was quick for all four of our phones & tablets - our devices range in age from brand new to 5 years old!! The packaging of the item is very impressive. It gives the impression that it is a high quality item - which is surprising for such a great price.

reviews.review_header: Very nice little blue tooth speaker
reviews.review_text: Very nice little blue tooth speaker. Auto connects every time you turn it on. Packaged really well. For $20 you absolutely can't beat it! One charges lasts HOURS!

reviews.review_header: it's really loud and the quality is good. How loud is it
reviews.review_text: This little speaker rocks! For a speaker that's smaller than the size of a palm, it's really loud and the quality is good. How loud is it? In the shower with the tap full on (all the water running and echoing), you can hear your music extremely loud and clear. Highly recommend it. It's light weight too.

Returned. Didn't like the sound. Not enough bass or volume for my tastes. Ya the size is great, but I would rather have a little larger speaker and fuller sound. Here I think size does matter somewhat, at least for my taste and purposes. Bought a photogenic Cyren and am pretty pleased with it.
This is a great little speaker. It's small enough to fit in my vest pocket when I'm out birding. Sound is loud enough to attract the birds. Battery lasts a long time.

I've had the speaker for about 6 months now and today I was outside washing my car and when I was done I placed it on top of the hood and forgot about it and drove off, while I was doing 50mph I noticed something fall down and it was the speaker I went back for it and to my surprise it only had a couple of scratches I turned it on and it worked perfectly

reviews.review_header: This is the best value for cost purchase I have ever made
reviews.review_text: This is the best value for cost purchase I have ever made. This speaker has great volume and clarity especially for it's size and cost. I amaze every one I show it to. I have been A&R for major labels like Capitol & Motown, I have great ears, I know what I am talking about.. get one before they are gone. This is an unpaid endorsement. Steve B

reviews.review_header: They make great gifts for your city dwelling friends with cramped space
reviews.review_text: I can not believe the sound quality that emanates from this little cube! I had recently attended a gathering where this speaker was the music source! I couldn't locate where the music was coming from and when my friend pointed to the little cube I thought he was kidding! If they'd turned up the volume I'm sure the neighbors would have complained! They make great gifts for your city dwelling friends with cramped space!

reviews.review_header: For the price and size its great.
reviews.review_text: For the price and size its great. I have had this a little over 1 month now and I use it quite often. Battery life is good, but the longest I've used it is 6 hr. straight and then recharged it. Sound is acceptable for its size and price. Its great for listening to light music or a ball games.
I did not like the speaker at all, it sounded like it was coming out of a barrel. Very mono sounding. I have returned it

Amazing sound in such a small box. The bass is even reasonable and the thing is less than 2" square. I take it to rehearsals so we can hear recordings of the practice. Very, very handy. Charges from USD. will work bluetooth or over a USB port (mac anyway, I don't know about PC).

reviews.review_header: Love this lightweight big sound speaker. Need new connector....
reviews.review_text: I love my little Anker Speaker. I don't use blue tooth; I have older equipment and I loved how I could hook th speaker to my older equipment and still get fine sound. I have lost the connecter that allows me to connect the speaker with my computer and other devices -- and I cannot seem to find out how to replace it. I hope that Anker can provide a replacement for it! Otherwise it will be loved and lost!
the battery doesn't last and the sound is always failing

Purchased this little cubed speaker and find it perfect for my use. Connected with my Spotify account it works as intended. It is smaller than the Blucube speaker and believe the sound to be compatible. Both Blucube speakers began to non-function after about 15 months. The device is used when I walk along the beach as a workout. Small enough to fit into any cargo shorts or workout pant.

This little speak packs a punch! Many of my friends that have heard this little guy have bought one for themselves. It doesn't have as much bass as its big brother, (A7908) but the volume is actually a little higher. The battery life is really good. It has no problem lasting all day at work. I have been very satisfied. I would buy this again.

Very good sound for a small and cheap bluetooth speaker. I like how portable this is, I can put it in my pocket and listen to it. It would be pretty nice to bring this on a hiking trip too. The sound can get pretty loud, which is pretty surprising for this little product. I wish it had volume buttons, the only way to change volume is through the phone. Anyways I'm pretty satisfied with this purchase.

I first started with Anker through a review online I read about external batteries. I loved the battery so much I bought two! Since I gained so much confidence in their products I decided to try this bluetooth speaker. I work in a shop and didn't want something bulky, also to use it on the weekends. This speaker packs sooo much punch for its size and could catch a signal at a very far range! I love this for the quality, mobility, sound quality and price!

reviews.review_header: Small and decent volume - don't charge & use at same time
reviews.review_text: Extremely mall, inexpensive, easy to use - and decent sound considering it's size. The instructions tell you not to have the device in use while it's charging as it can tax the internal battery. I think that's easy to overlook and could have been more prominently conveyed. I use it for travel and it's great that it has such a long battery life - no need to charge till I get home.

I had to hear it to believe it! It's a marvel of design and electronics, so simple and so efficient. Even the packaging in which it comes is beautifully designed. It has a great sound for such a small device, mind you, maybe not enough for a party, but clear enough to enjoy your music with a couple of friends. I can't wait to take it on the road, and have music with me wherever I go.

reviews.review_header: This Bluetooth speaker is amazing! I actually bought one for myself initially
reviews.review_text: This Bluetooth speaker is amazing! I actually bought one for myself initially, then bought two more for my parents because it was that good. The best thing about this speaker is probably how loud this small speaker can get! Definitely would recommend.. and buy again.

reviews.review_header: The sound is nice, but I've bought a cheaper iHome speaker that ...
reviews.review_text: The sound is nice, but I've bought a cheaper iHome speaker that was a slightly clearer sound on higher volume levels in my opinion. I didn't compare them side by side, but overall this was a good purchase and its build quality and appearance is much better than any other on the market.

reviews.review_header: MUCH smaller than I expected and packs a pretty good sound
reviews.review_text: This speaker is tiny! About the size of a GoPro session or I don't even know what else to compare it too. MUCH smaller than I expected and packs a pretty good sound. Thinking of buying the slightly larger version of this to see if that thing can push noise throughout my entire house, lol

reviews.review_header: Amazing sound out of this tiny cube!
reviews.review_text: Wow is this thing loud! I have never heard such volume from such a tiny speaker! In addition to being loud the sound quality is pretty decent, it struggles a little bit with bass, but what can you expect from a speaker that is a 1.8" cube. Paired with my phone and tablet easily and works flawlessly. Anker is becoming my goto brand for electronics recently as there stuff is simple, solid and just works!

Decent speaker for listening to music. Anything with spoken word (podcasts or audio books) will cause the speaker to drop words during pauses in a conversation. The speaker is up to Ankers quality construction but this is the first Anker product that has disappointed me.
Not a sweet sound locks all range in music

reviews.review_header: Best little speaker for the price
reviews.review_text: As the headline says this is the best little speaker for the price. I've had a few little speakers but the Anker takes the cake. It doesn't have a lot of bass, but even at full volume at has good sound quality. The battery life is amazing for the size, I'm able to use it all day at work without needing to charge it (compared to other bigger speakers that need to charge after 3-5 hours)

reviews.review_header: Very good for being so small
reviews.review_text: Very good for being so small. Not a boom box, but it's great in a small room, or at your work desk.

reviews.review_header: I bought 6 of these, they are REALLY GOOD!!!
reviews.review_text: I bought this speaker for 5 reasons: 1. excellent build quality 2. good sound 3. good volume given it's small size 4. long battery life 5. light weight Bought 6 of it. One for me, another as a gift. The four are for my 4 officemates who were really impressed with it. :)

This small speaker is everything that it was advertised to be. I use it in my pocket blue toothed with my iPod nano while riding my bike. It's got plenty of volume to hear over road noise and other distractions. It's got the feel of ruggedness but I haven't tried it out that way yet. It works great and is a super value. It's played 10 hours and didn't run out of battery power. Also it's quick to recharge.

reviews.review_header: I like the sound and the portability of it
reviews.review_text: I had the larger size and it broke so I tried the smaller one here. I like the sound and the portability of it. I miss the ability to control the volume from the speaker (which is on the larger one.) But you can pause a song or podcast from the speaker, which is nice. You can plug non-Bluetooth ready devices into it using the USB port and a male end speaker plug which is nice. I mostly listen to podcasts with it but music sounds good too.

reviews.review_header: Tiny Speaker Provides Very Good Sound
reviews.review_text: This little USB speaker produces a very good quality sound, and a lot of it. My laptop has very poor built in speakers, so I bought this so I could enjoy quality sound from Youtube and other internet videos. It connected easily via Bluetooth. I am very satisfied with it. Just be aware that a Bluetooth transmitter is not included, so if your computer does not have built in Bluetooth you will have to buy one.
Easy set up and really great sound. Wish I’d bought two the first time.

reviews.review_header: I was amazed at the volume it could reach
reviews.review_text: Awsome sounding speaker for the size!! I was amazed at the volume it could reach. Connected to my phone and IPad with no problem, but my laptop needs a driver installed before it will pair. No problem though. I will eventually get it paired. VERY happy and highly recommend!

reviews.review_header: It works well and pairs easily via bluetooth
reviews.review_text: This project has lived up to its promise. It works well and pairs easily via bluetooth. I was hoping for a BIT more volume, but truthfully, for the size, it's still quite good. I think more volume for the speaker size would probably create distortion. This is the 3rd or 4th Anker product I own, and all of them have been super reliable and well worth the money.

I have purchased 2 speakers. The speakers are very compact, yet put out a great sound for my needs. I use this with an I pod shuffle to play cougar sounds all day in hopes of keeping coyotes away. The speakers play at least 12 hours daily and have not yet failed.

reviews.review_header: this is an amazing speaker, ESPECIALLY for the price
reviews.review_text: I don't write reviews but I must say, this is an amazing speaker, ESPECIALLY for the price! Small, and very portable. But VERY powerful! Amazing bass and sound quality, perfect for small get togethers, or if you like to listen to music while you shower (don't lie, you do), or anything in between. Battery life is also great - lasts me about 10 hours on full volume before it dies.

reviews.review_header: This is an amazing speaker. I left it on my back yard ...
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing speaker. I left it on my back yard for 2 weeks and it was raining and snowing and guess what........ it still works perfectly. I have it for about 3 years. Very satisfied:)

reviews.review_header: Does what it says and what you would expect it ...
reviews.review_text: Does what it says and what you would expect it to, for its size. Setting it up is very simple and my phone automatically connects each time. Battery life also holds up well, even with frequent use throughout the day.

reviews.review_header: Surprised. Compact package makes a CD/tape player dongle for ...
reviews.review_text: Surprised. Compact package makes a CD/tape player dongle for my relatives with hearing problems. The blind can plug it into radios and audio book devices for loud, clear audio. Not complex to use, operates by touch, even the recharging can be done by the blind. Not stereo, so the audio source does not matter. Tested the bluetooth connect, it worked, but never will use it, due to too much fiddling.

Amazing device. I was blown away by the larger speaker from anker until recently I had to part with it as a gift to a younger one in the family. Ordered this little speaker for its NFC after a few days and this speaker is ridiculously loud and produces premium sound at the sound time. Highly recommended if your looking for a tiny speaker to carry with your phone.

Cute little box of sound. Not huge but for my cell in the morning I can start some music while cooking breakfast and then tote this and my phone easily through my morning routine. Satisfying for a casual music listener. If you are expecting boom box sound out of a tiny little cube, well, not really. Want a better sound than your phone speaker in an easy to tote size, then it's a perfect fit.

Since my office doesn't have a speaker, I used this since I bought it. I'm satisfy with it so far, the only downside is that you can't charge it while using it. As far as I know this is good as it will greatly boost the lifetime of this speaker!

reviews.review_header: Perfect for long outdoor activity like camping
reviews.review_text: It works well for my mac and phone. It is so small that I can put it into my pocket. Perfect for long outdoor activity like camping, picnicking, etc. Portal power bank is recommended for long period of using. The auto-shutdown mechanism is good for preserving battery power when it is not connected to any bluetooth source for several minutes. Connection issues rarely happen to me.

It puts a surprising amount of volume out for such a little cube, but the single speaker overloads quick and cannot deliver the higher pitches. For 20$, it's tolerable for a shower speaker, or very low volumes. Just don't expect to use more than half the volume

This is surprisingly tiny!! (in a good way) For such a small lil' thing, this cutie sure packs a LOT of punch! Clarity is great on more treble-y songs, but it definitely lacks the base of bigger speakers. Given the price, size, and battery life, I would very likely buy this again if I couldn't find a similar product with better base. Update Feb 2017: Two years later and this thing still works as well as the day I bought it. I'd recommend it!

reviews.review_header: Insanely good - have bought more Sound is great
reviews.review_text: Insanely good - have bought more Sound is great !!! Use in the car - in the house- would like a loop or place to Hook carry strap - friends have bought it

This little cube has some power. It definitely gets really loud and stays really clear with no distortion. The range on it from my phone was easily over 20 ft so a strong Bluetooth connection at least. One thing that's nice is the sleek packaging and the really nice bag you get to put everything in. Only thing is it doesn't come with an actual charger, just the usb cable and the auxiliary audio to usb cable. Still for 22 bucks this thing can't be beat !!!

reviews.review_header: cute little cube like this, and the LED is not annoyingly bright ...
reviews.review_text: I got this to help play white noise / rain sounds from my phone app for while I'm asleep. It's adorbs, cute little cube like this, and the LED is not annoyingly bright like the pop-up-ball speaker I had before. It Bluetooths fine with my phone and holds a charge quite a long time, --- BUT, when it does start to run low, it SPEAKS, IN A HUMAN VOICE, "BATTERY LOW" and THAT wakes me up and freaks me out and I do not like that part of it. The rest of its vocabulary seems to be quiet beeps so I'm not sure why they felt the need for it to get all verbose instead of just fading out quietly which would have been a pretty good indicator of low power, but. Anyway, I decided to keep it-- having it be wireless to the phone is a very nice feature, and it's light and small enough that it's easy to throw in my gig-bag to go.

reviews.review_header: It's Anker. Expect a good well made product worth every bit what it sells for.
reviews.review_text: No complaints except it does not charge while listening to music. For $20 well worth it. Battery life stellar, and exceeds what it claims if you ask me. Audio, I'm very happy with. It barely distorts at high high volume. Don't expect this little device to perform miracles in audio. If I lose it I'll be bummed, but hey $20, I'll buy another. Pretty small. Very close to size of ring box.

Wow......this is one of the neatest audio devices i have bought! Don't let its tint footprint fool you since the sound it produces is superb and crystal clear! The Bluetooth connects to every device i have tried it with without a flaw. The distance is amazing. I can leave my iPod in the living room and bring this baby into ant room in the house and it works perfectly! For the money, it's the best Bluetooth speaker out there!

reviews.review_header: Great little speaker for close by listening
reviews.review_text: Great little speaker for close by listening....great price, bought 2 of them. My wife has hers on her desk at work.

reviews.review_header: Great speaker, Low price, and big sound!
reviews.review_text: Amazing. This is not the loudest speaker in the world obviously, but it was more then loud enough to play in the hallways of my highschool, and still be heard over all the talking. Little box with huge sound! Love this thing. Loud, Small, and long lasting battery! 5 stars!

Not as loud as we expected but good enough for our purposes. It has the perfect size to carry anywhere, it has its own pouch. Beautifully designed. I haven't measure how long the battery last, but we don't charge it very often.
I expected the sound to be a little better from the reviews. It has no bass and sounds a little tinny to me. Battery life seems to be very good.

This has become the official speaker for every barbecue, sunday at the pool or beach. It happens several times that I stare to my friends while they hold the speaker in the palm of the hand while keep saying the same "how is this possible, a great sound from a tiny device "

reviews.review_header: Great generic, but awesome gift for anyone.
reviews.review_text: Such a nice little gift for a work Christmas gift exchange. My colleague says she uses it to listen to music at her other job at Panda Express -- and she can hear it from the end of the small, outdoor mall restaurant to the front of the establishment.

This thing is tiny and impressively! The battery (internal) lasts for a very long time and it's small enough to fit in a small pocket of a gym bag. The sound is incredibly loud! My only complaint is there is a definite lack of base, but for the size what should you expect.

works well..received it today and been putting it through the paces. First thing is the size. perfect size ultra portable and great design feels and looks like more then i spent. The range is decent same as any other BT speaker easily be in the same or next room no problem. The sound is decent considering all things such as price, size, etc...minimal distortion at high volume t is very loud and the sound is enjoyable with you tube videos or even netflix movies on my phone.Spotify sounded good too..Only thing i had to take a star away for was that i guess since its missing a mic my Note 4 wont let me use it as a speaker phone. i though i would at least be able to hear the talking over the speaker and use note 4 mic, but nope it just wont let you..

For its size it pumps out a lot of volume, and with good clarity. Battery life is pretty good as well. Works perfect for what I use it for. Update: Unfortunately mine stopped working after a while. All it does is make a popping noise when I try to turn it on. Not sure how to contact the seller.

reviews.review_header: They work great, put out nice sound and are a great ...
reviews.review_text: We have about five Anker speakers of various sizes for our devices. They work great, put out nice sound and are a great product.

reviews.review_header: Not a boombox but really booms for its size and surprises on the upside!
reviews.review_text: Awesome sound for such a small package. Quality throughout. I particularly like it when played through an equalizer app where you can mildly bump the highs and lows but that is just the icing on the cake. Equalizer or not, this speaker rocks! Bought three for my household and sent three to my nieces.
I was stunned at how loud this little guy gets! Good charge life and it's louder than the slightly larger speaker from Anker.

reviews.review_header: This small little thing is awesome! Though I don't think that the battery will ...
reviews.review_text: This small little thing is awesome! Though I don't think that the battery will last a full 12 hours, it last pretty long without having to charge it. Sound can't be compared to bigger speakers but its has high clarity and it is Loud! It does have decent bass in it as well. Overall, I like it though after my purchase, I found a much cheaper price on ebay.

reviews.review_header: and I was amazed this is awesome pocket speaker
reviews.review_text: Finally my A7910 arrived yesterday..I've tried today, the quality and the sound. and I was amazed this is awesome pocket speaker! not like to all expensive port. speaker.pay more money with a low quality,you just gonna regret...I'll recommend A7910 to each everyone. It's handy, easy to use and legit!
It is everything and more. We have recommended it to friends and family. So convenient, easy AND portable.

this little guy is the bomb dot com. a speaker this tiny has limits of course but it does get loud. I can hear it on the other side of the house and the quality of sound is great. the battery lasts forever and it charges fast. this is a well made product with a great company behind it. if you're looking for a portable speaker you can't beat the quality and price of anker.

I bought this device on sale for $20 rather than its usual price of $40. I'm very glad it was on sale because I wouldn't have bought it if it was still $40 (due to a lack of cash flow ATM) which would have been a huge shame as this device is exceptional in every way. When holding and viewing this speaker you can tell that it is very high quality due to the materials used and tight manufacturing tolerances involved. When you listen to it you will be staggered at how marvelous it really is. How on earth they fit a speaker, amplifier, Bluetooth and NFC electronics, battery etc in such a tiny device, and with very high quality sound, is just amazing. The sound isn't perfect mind you, it lacks slightly in the treble range due to the fact that it's a mono device and doesn't have that stereo separation (that impacts on the way treble is discerned by the listeners ears), and the bass whilst loud, lacks much oomph or thump, but that's to be expected. But the sound quality far surpasses what you would believe possible in a 1.8" square cube. It really is astonishing. At $40, this would certainly be a reasonable price as it's quality sound and features and manufacturing standards are very high, but at it's reduced price of $20 it's an absolute must buy. Exceptional value. My only gripe is that you can't buy two and pair both to use in stereo, although you can certainly use a Y-splitter cable to wire up two to create the illusion of stereo (and more volume) to some extent. If money wasn't an issue for me I would certainly have no issue buying this device for $40. It's one of the best buys I've ever bought. Really an exceptional device in a market flooded with absolutely garbage quality speakers. This one will take some serious effort to be beaten. This is "the" perfect device for audio lovers who absolutely must listen to music through their smartphone or tablet etc but who have to use headphones due to the poor quality of smartphone speakers. It is loud enough to fill a room. Not for a party mind you, but it's loud enough at full volume for it to be annoyingly loud if you aren't in the mood to have your head blown off. If you are sick of smartphone speakers, annoyed by tangling cables on your headphones, then this is a no-brainer. Even if your phone has front facing speakers like the HTC one series, or has boosted sound output like the 1W LG G3 etc, this device will blow them into the weeds for volume and sound quality. The issues I raised of the slight lack of treble and bass can be largely overcome with a mild bit of equalization. But I need to make it clear that these issues are only relative. As is, it provides great sound quality, and for its size and cost, exceptional sound. I would not hesitate to recommend this device. I should also mention that it's battery life is tremendous given its size, volume output, and constant Bluetooth/NFC connection. You won't regret buying this device.

Awesome speaker really small monster . But need some improvement in next version 1- add mic 2- need to be heavier a little to not move on surfaces I know some people will say " light better" but really moving when i play music specially with a lot of base

reviews.review_header: Battery life isn't that great, I get maybe 2 hours max on full ...
reviews.review_text: Battery life isn't that great, I get maybe 2 hours max on full blast The sound is ok for the size, I was just looking forward to having a speaker I didn't have to plug in every few hrs.

reviews.review_header: Big sound from a small cube
reviews.review_text: Big sound from such a small speaker. I purchased this to listen to music around the house, and it easily fills a room with sound. It has great sound quality, and it's very easy to pair with any device. Very pleased with this little speaker. Easy to travel with as well.

reviews.review_header: So much sound in a little tiny box!
reviews.review_text: For a little tiny thing, it reaches great volumes. Sound quality stretches a little thin when it gets louder but it's as expected. This thing also lasts almost a lifetime. I've had it running for about 10.5 hrs before I needed to charge it. Great buy!

reviews.review_header: It's anker! Just buy it and enjoy!
reviews.review_text: I will be getting more of these! The sound is good and bold and surprisingly loud! I use mine in my scx10 6x6, we do trail runs and g6 type events and the speaker fit perfectly sounds awesome the Bluetooth works well up to I'd guess 25 ft outdoors inside it works better.

reviews.review_header: it's a perfect match. I'm looking forward to traveling with it ...
reviews.review_text: This gives surprisingly high-quality for such a small speaker. I expected essentially no bass and was pleasantly surprised. Obviously, it won't rock the house down nor complete with $1000 high-fidelity speakers, but for what it is intended, it's a perfect match. I'm looking forward to traveling with it in the future.

This is a little speaker with a clear, loud sound. You can put it anywhere as it is tiny and doesn't take up too much space. Like it.... and really like Anker products. Had a little trouble with the bluetooth lagging and some distorted sound. I contacted Anker support they were great and sent out a replacement right away. They also sent a label for mailing back the defective one.

I hooked this up to my ROKU remotes headphone jack for "late night tv viewing" so as not to disturb others in my household. I was quite suprised at how powerful this little speaker is! Nice clear sound at low and high volume levels, with just the right amount of bass. Pretty cool little guy!

reviews.review_header: not realizing i could easily connect with bluetooth
reviews.review_text: i used with the cable on my iPhone 6 Plus, not realizing i could easily connect with bluetooth. Love this little speaker. As loud as I'd want it to be and battery lasts for hours and hours, longer than I would expect.

Fantastic sound for the size. I also have the altec lancing mini h2o speaker which is a little bigger,6 hr battery life and has 2 speakers and this one has overall beter sound and 12 hr battery life.Definitely worth $20!
Little but powerful. Not the greatest sound but damn good for such a tiny speaker.

What a deal! This thing goes above and beyond what I was expecting for a $20 speaker of this size. The sound is good and not tinny. It's not as bright sounding as our UE Boom but it has a nice rich full sound and decent volume for 1/10 the price. Overall, a great speaker for the office or a picnic and generally impressive sound and battery life for the size and price.

reviews.review_header: Love this product because its so small but with very ...
reviews.review_text: Love this product because its so small but with very good sound. We use it in our car in order to hear podcasts from Iphone or Ipad because we don't have ability to connect to the built-in stereo (no AUX connector). But its small enough and with enough battery charge so that it can be put into a small backpack pocket and used for portable sound . It was perfect for what we needed.

Great product. Great sound. But best of all it only weighs a few ounces so I always toss it into my bag when I'm on the road. It's great for listening to the news, talk shows, and music while in your hotel room. If they could manage to also squeeze a microphone into this package so that it could be used for conference calls, THAT would be truly incredible.

reviews.review_header: One of the best purchases that I've ever made
reviews.review_text: WOW! WOW! WOW! WOW! WOW! Did I say wow??!!! This speaker will absolutely blow your mind for $20. One of the best purchases that I've ever made. It doesn't dawn on you how tiny the thing is until you're holding it, and the sound is really good. I highly recommend.

Cool little speaker. Decent sound for the size. Works for most eveything I need it for. Seems well built and packaged. The only issue I've had is playing Audible books through it (clips the first syllable of a word from time to time), but Anker is aware of the issue and is working on it. Very responsive customer support! Recommended, recognizing this is a very small (and cute) speaker.

Very nice product for the price, even though the base range is not excelent, in general it sounds good and loud for its size. I use it to stream audio from my iPhone while projecting a video presentation via HDMI to a mini projector using Powerpoint and it does the trick. I also will be giving some of these away as Christmas presents for my customers

reviews.review_header: He loved it! He had it synced to his phone ...
reviews.review_text: Wasn't sure about this. My brother-in-law wanted a portable speaker for Christmas. I got him this one. He loved it! He had it synced to his phone in seconds and the sound was pretty impressive for such a small speaker. The rest of my family was a little jealous that they didn't get one too!
Amazing sound... just ordered another as a gift!

reviews.review_header: If you don't plan a party speaker.
reviews.review_text: First, it's very small as you can so don't expect to it any part. That said, 1) sound. Not a super strong base but good for its size. No distortion noticed. 2) Volume: Oh, it can be loud. 3) Buttons : 1 . power on/BT sync. 4) Connectors: 1 . Micro usb. Charge/AUX with special cable. Note: no microphone. - a minimalistic great speaker.

Great price/value product. We bought it for a 4-day road trip and it worked flawlessly. The battery life was fantastic-at least 10 hours in our case. The low end performance is as you would expect from a 1.5" square speaker, but it met our need perfectly.

Fantastic speaker. It is portable due to it small size. It is stylish. The battery life is amazing. Volume as other reviews stated is unbelievable. Connects without any problems. Shipment arrives as promised. The product was in excellent condition. I am extremely satisfied

Really surprised with this mini bluetooth speaker! I was skeptical about this speaker too before i bought it. But i was proven wrong when i used it. It only make sense since i own an previous model anker bluetooth speaker too. Superb build quality, long battery life, good bluetooth range, and definitely great sound for a tiny speaker!

This little thing has great sound and volume, and is pretty much idiot proof to set up and operate, even for someone technology challenged as myself. Good battery life as well. Had it on 2 nights of camping for about 6-8 hours each night and still had more charge to go!

reviews.review_header: This is an amazing little speaker
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing little speaker. For it's size, I was shocked at the volume and clarity this could produce. Obviously larger speakers will produce better sound, but this is fantastic. And as always, Anker's packaging and product presentation is great. I had no problem giving this 5 stars.

It's not a boom box but for its size, the performance is amazing. Definitely better and louder sound than my tablet or cell phone speakers. Works great in office environments or casual settings without too much background noise. Use it every day for about 8 hours straight. Really impressed with the battery life. It's tiny! Love it.

Great for travel! We have a Bose Soundlink Mini but that beast is a little hefty. So I decided to invest in a more portable but less expensive speaker.
